0.title: Medical Aid
0.description: We provide medical assistance and support to people affected by war, working in the most challenging conditions to deliver essential care.

1.title: Emergency Response
1.description: Our team responds quickly to emergencies, offering critical support in the first hours after a disaster.

2.title: Long-Term Treatment
2.description: We help patients access long-term treatments and rehabilitation in trusted international hospitals.

3.title: Mental Health Support
3.description: We support the psychological well-being of individuals affected by trauma through counseling and therapy.

4.title: Access to Specialists
4.description: We connect patients with highly qualified doctors and surgeons in the best clinics across Turkey.

5.title: Humanitarian Logistics
5.description: We organize safe transportation, accommodation, and translation support for patients and families in need.
